question: If you are designing a bridge, would it be a sturdy steel structure connecting commmunities or whimsical suspension bridge inspiring unity through creativity?
When designing for accessibility, do you prefer a universal design approach that fits all or a customized solutions approach?
If your design team were a superhero duo, would you be Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S (futuristic human-AI partnership), Batman and Robin (classic human teamwork), or some of both?
What is a good team size for you? Slide through the range from working solo (1) to a team of 20 members.
In the fight against climate change, are you a Green warrior leading the charge, a Quiet innovator making a difference behind the scenes, or some of both?
When imagining a sustainable future, do you prefer innovative technology-driven solutions, a return to traditional and natural methods, or some of both?
